name: braintree-web-drop-in-react
description: React component for Braintree Web Drop-In (v3)
author: Charles Crete <charles@cretezy.com>

scripts.build: babel src -d lib --source-maps && terser lib/index.js -o lib/index.min.js --source-map 'content=lib/index.js.map'
scripts.format: prettier --write 'src/**.js' package.json CHANGELOG.md README.md .travis.yml example/index.html example/index.js example/README.md example/package.json
scripts.example: cd example && npm install && npm run start
